r.d: GUPnP is an object-oriented open source framework for creating UPnP devices and control points, written in C using GObject and libsoup. This extension wraps GUPnP and provides similar API.
r.n: - First beta release. - Add gupnp_service_proxy_send_action() function. - Fix zend_is_callable for PHP 5.3. - Add ZEND_ARG_INFO* definitions.
